text: Krzysztof Rafalak (born 13 September 1956) is a Polish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Poland Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Sopot
title: Krzysztof Rafalak
